testcase.classname: user should be able to register with valid data
testcase.name: user could sign up with valid data
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to home page............................................passed And user click to register..................................................passed When user enter a valid section of first name,last name and Email...........passed And user enter a valid section of password and confirm password.............passed And user click on register button...........................................passed Then user should register successfully and success msg is appeared..........passed And user logout.............................................................passed

testcase.classname: user should be able to login to the system
testcase.name: user is able to login with valid username and password
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to login page...........................................passed And user enter valid Email and password.....................................passed When user click on login button.............................................passed Then user could login successfully and go to home page......................passed

testcase.classname: user should be able to login to the system
testcase.name: user login with invalid username and password
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to login page...........................................passed And user enter invalid Email and password...................................passed When user click on login button.............................................passed Then user couldn't login successfully and error msg is displayed............passed

testcase.classname: user able to search for any product in advanced search
testcase.name: user could search for product using the name
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to login page...........................................passed And user enter valid Email and password.....................................passed When user click on login button.............................................passed And user click to search....................................................passed When user search with the name of the product...............................passed Then user is able to find what lookig for...................................passed

testcase.classname: user able to search for any product in advanced search
testcase.name: user could search for product using the Categories list search
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to login page...........................................passed And user enter valid Email and password.....................................passed When user click on login button.............................................passed When user search using the categories for example Jewelry...................passed Then user is able to find what lookig for from categories...................passed

testcase.classname: user able to add the product to shopping cart
testcase.name: user is able to add the product to shopping cart
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to login page...........................................passed And user enter valid Email and password.....................................passed When user click on login button.............................................passed Given user has an empty shopping cart.......................................passed And user search with the name of the product................................passed When user click the add to cart button to add the product to shopping cart..passed Then The shopping cart is displayed the item added..........................passed

testcase.classname: user able to add the product to wishlist
testcase.name: user is able to add the product to wishlist
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to login page...........................................passed And user enter valid Email and password.....................................passed When user click on login button.............................................passed Given user has an empty wishlist............................................passed And user search with the name of the product................................passed When user click the add the product to wishlist.............................passed Then The wishlist is displayed the item added...............................passed

testcase.classname: user able to add the product to compare list
testcase.name: user is able to add the product to compare list
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to login page...........................................passed And user enter valid Email and password.....................................passed When user click on login button.............................................passed And user search with the name of the product................................passed When user click the add the product to compare list.........................passed Then The compare list is displayed the item added...........................passed

testcase.name: user is able to switch currencies using US
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to login page...........................................passed And user enter valid Email and password.....................................passed And user click on login button..............................................passed When user click the switch currencies.......................................passed Then Different currencies appears choosen US................................passed

testcase.name: user is able to switch currencies using Euro
user forget password
testcase.system-out: Given user navigate to login page...........................................passed And user click on Forgot password button....................................passed When Password recovery page opened..........................................passed And ask user to enter yor email address.....................................passed And click on recover button.................................................passed Then msg recovery sent......................................................passed

testcase.classname: user should be able to make a successful order
testcase.name: user could doing a successful order
testcase.system-out: And user navigate to login page.............................................passed And user enter valid Email and password.....................................passed And user click on login button..............................................passed And user could login successfully and go to home page.......................passed And user search with the name of the product................................passed And user is able to find what lookig for....................................passed And user click the add to cart button to add the product to shopping cart...passed And The shopping cart is displayed the item added...........................passed When user agree with the terms of service...................................passed Then user could doing checkout..............................................passed
